topic.title: Censored Youtube
topic.body:
What do you think about creating censored Youtube? I don't think I want to see porn when I visit a site to  watch non-porn videos. And what's wrong with its previews? I can't even upload one.

http://127.0.0.1:43110/149EPBN4hQRpwj5TcoPETepnoXHCUXzaCN

topic.title: Zite creation: multipage zites
topic.body: How can I add pages to my zite? Not just index.html, but other ones.

topic.title: More complex multiuser interactions: online games, wallets, etc
topic.body: Are we able to create zites with them? At least, multiplayer rock-paper-scissors and card games?

topic.title: Why is ZeroMedium closed
topic.body: I can't reach ZeroMedium, was it deleted?

1556657973_18yjuvi7DyL85Rip57MiXEcGhkgCv.body: Creating dirs with index.html for route handling is not a good practise

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_813_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): Open your site directory (zeronet/data/yoursiteaddress) and create a copy of the index.html [...]

And what about route handling? Not with index.htmls in multiple directories.

1557692157_18yjuvi7DyL85Rip57MiXEcGhkgCv.body:
> [robione](#comment_236_1DoVPxFrQCDb3grC8Nsn6aACed9o2oiumX): yes, many such things have already been made.game with zeroframe and godot plugin for example.

Where can I find them?
